data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Popular Fantasy Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
A useful set of material for standing pictures of characters based on familiar character types and professions commonly found in fantasy RPGs.

Includes 18 characters, each character has 9 professions x 2 (male and female), and 16 basic expression differences.
Also includes walking graphics, side-view graphics, and enemy graphics, so that you can create your own epic RPG!

*****

* pictures: 288 items (each character x 16 expressions)
* characters: 4 sheets, 18 points (each character x 1 type, with lying down expression differences)
* faces: 36 sheets, 288 faces (each character x 16 expressions)
* enemies: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)
* sv_enemies: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)
* sv_actors: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)

*****

Each character has two sizes, large and small. Please use the size that suits your preference.
There are also variations for having a weapon and not having a weapon, so you can use them according to the situation.
* Please note there is no weapon difference for the martial artist only

In addition, this DLC includes full-size PSD data, layered by facial expression parts (eyebrows, eyes, mouth, etc.). You can freely combine the parts to create unique expressions.
If you only want to create face graphics, the resized data is also available for your convenience.

To reduce the size of your game, all PNG data has been processed to be lightweight.

*****

Games by Yutaro Tsuyuki:
RealityMinds
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1616050/RealityMinds/
